abstract: Former mixed martial arts champion Anderson Silva will fight Michael Bisping in  Ultimate Fighting Championship bout, after completing one-year suspension for steroid use.
lead_paragraph: The former champion Anderson Silva, after finishing a one-year suspension for steroid use, will return to the Ultimate Fighting Championship in a bout against Michael Bisping on Feb. 27.
snippet: The former champion Anderson Silva, after finishing a one-year suspension for steroid use, will return to the Ultimate Fighting Championship in a bout against Michael Bisping on Feb. 27.
